name: Traveler
message: Hey kid I need my money back... you shouldn't take other people's things

name: Ragged child
message: Yeah? well you know... I need it more than you

name: Traveler
message: Pff... Where are your parents? You're too young to be stealing

name: Ragged child
message: ... It doesn't concern you, just go away, you don't belong here

name: Traveler
message: I wont leave until I get my money back

name: Ragged child
message: You are just like them...

name: Traveler
message: Like who? what are you talking about?

name: Ragged child
message: Shout up! you're all the same, you don't understand, you haven't seen

name: Option
message: What happened to this kid? He seems... broken, I must be careful with what I say next

name: Traveler
message: I understand, But-

name: Ragged child
message: You understand?? don't make me laugh, you don't know anything about me, about what I had to do

name: Traveler
message: You're right, I don't know you and yet I can see how broken you are

name: Ragged child
message: You... I...

name: Traveler
message: I can see you've been through a lot, this doesn't look like a place for kids

name: Ragged child
message: Just go away...

name: Traveler
message: Maybe I can help you, if you explain me what happened to you

name: Ragged child
message: You can't, nobody can help me... I'm... alone

name: Option
message: So, his parents may be dead... and he has been alone all this time, I need to know more

name: Traveler
message: Hey! I really don't understand you, but you should be more respectfull, you just stole my money

name: Ragged child
message: So your only concern is your money, this is only about that

name: Traveler
message: Of course is about that... pff, but not only the money

name: Traveler
message: I'm sorry I just got angry, I don't want to yell at you, all of this situation-

name: Ragged child
message: It doesn't matter, that's the usual behavior towards children in this zone

name: Ragged child
message: You still don't understand how Valdir works, and yet here you are, going inside the darkness

name: Option
message: He talks like an adult, there's no hope in his eyes... but he is just a kid

name: Ragged child
message: You don't need to say nothing...

name: Ragged child
message: Wait... who is that?
